oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Implementation of welfare assessment and health plan evaluation into organic certification
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poultry
Dairy cattle
Pigs
Health and welfare
Beef cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To implement the welfare assessment and health plan evaluation within the certification system. It is associated with Defra project OF0314, which was intended to ensure the applicability of this program to organic systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} BAWP: Implementation of welfare assessment and health plan evaluation into organic certification. Runs 2006 - 2008. Project Leader(s): David, Maine, School of Veterinary Science, University of Bristol.
